description_html:
Moroccan Rose is an uber-sophisticated interpretation of a textile that could be found in a souk or market in Marrakech. It is a delicate ethnic textile design featuring rich hues of Moroccan spices, the Mediterranean Sea and North African sky. Rich, raised, saturated colors are woven atop earthy ground colors in a finely designed pattern fashioned after the natural bounty and found objects associated with Africanate tribal cultures. Your projects will enjoy years of worry-free performance with Nomi’s durable, UV and stain resistant, bleach- cleanable, anti-microbial textiles. Available through to-the-trade showrooms and directly through Nomi’s design studio in Northern California.

Colors: Indigo, Coral, Celadon
Width: 54” Repeat: 7”V 7”H
100% Solution Dyed Polyolefin
Passes: NFPA#260 / CA#117
Abrasion: 70,000
